name: Pumpkin's Bedtime VR
description:
Created in Quill by Smoothstep, intended for use on Oculus/Meta Quest. Game can be accessed in Quest via Meta Quest TV; see Oculus experience link provided to access.

 Players without access to the Quest may follow along using the YouTube video link provided, pausing the video to complete tasks when prompted.

---------------------

Follow Pumpkin's bedtime routine in this calm and cozy linear game that includes role-playing and storytelling elements. Become the caretaker of Pumpkin through tasks such as tucking them in, reading them a story of your choosing, soothing and explaining when they resist the bedtime routine, and lying with them in the dark. Choose how long to pause in each moment as you and Pumpkin wind down, bond and snuggle.
